title: Loom
info: The Loom is a crafting station used to craft Silk, as well as some items that require Silk as an ingredient. It can sometimes be found in Underground Cabins.
stat:
Type
FurnitureCrafting station
Placeable (3 wide × 2 high)
Use time15 (Very fast)
TooltipUsed for crafting cloth
Rarity00*
Sell60
Research1 required
